name: Spy Bird Demo
description:
Help Spy Bird navigate through a big office to find a special blue folder while avoiding getting caught by the office workers!

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys - Move
Spacebar - Jump
Left Ctrl - Fly/Hover

Game Resources/Attributions (All found on the Unity Asset Store):
> Low Poly Bird Model - Made by Acorn Bringer
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/simplistic-low-poly-nature...

> Low Poly Office Themed Assets - Made by Polygonal Mind
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/low-poly-office-pack-charact...

> Cone Collider - Made by ISEMITO
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/conecollider-62755

> BGM

> Game Over SFX

> Object Pickup SFX

> Object Collision SFX

> Background Image for Home, End, and Win Scene - From Google Images
